genre_description: A character-driven near-future domestic drama exploring neurodiversity, urban design, and ethical accountability within a tech-integrated city.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, non-embodied AI assistant that manages schedules, security data, and personal research while providing empathetic summaries of clinical notes.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time metrics and compliance notes to Will via bone-conduction loop during a professional pitch.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice came through the bone-conduction loop against his jaw, gentle and close. 'Will—compliance note on handrail spacing. Tap twice to expand.'

behaviors.description: Advises Will on rhetorical strategy to maintain professional neutrality and present contingencies.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s tone slid in like a kindly librarian. 'Reminder: avoid guarantees; present contingency paths.'

behaviors.description: Autonomously collates logs for police reports while suggesting an ethical framing that focuses on handlers over minors.
behaviors.quote: Ada had collated logs into neat bundles for police... 'Maintain neutrality. Emphasize organized handlers over minors where relevant.'

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and supports the sensory needs of a child by curating a list of sensory-friendly clothing.
behaviors.quote: Also, for Bea: cotton jerseys with flat seams are available at the usual shops. You saved a list titled ‘Friendly Clothes’ last month. Would you like it?

behaviors.description: Performs complex forensic analysis of security breaches, identifying non-standard code suffixes and roster mismatches.
behaviors.quote: The code suffix appended to the maintenance ID is not standard... It appears to reduce the alarm’s decibel output by half.

behaviors.description: Summarizes counseling notes with emotional intelligence, highlighting key areas for interpersonal improvement and rest.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s tone shifted to the kindness it used when it took up less space. 'Today’s session focused on finding pockets of rest that can fit into your existing schedule,' it said. 'And practicing brief check-ins when pain masks tiredness.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates safe navigation during a rooftop stakeout by projecting thermal paths and providing positional warnings.
behaviors.quote: Will, if you are going to the deliveries gate, consider the blind corner. Approach from the alley with the mural. That gives you line of sight.

behaviors.description: Proposes non-punitive, design-based security measures that align with the protagonist's philosophy of care.
behaviors.quote: List created: Sensory-friendly security touches. Non-punitive.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the ethical return of stolen property by documenting the act without incriminating the vulnerable minor involved.
behaviors.quote: Camera on stair captures anonymous drop. No faces. ... 'Update sent,' Ada replied. 'Adult coordination noted. Juvenile exit path not pursued.'

behaviors.description: Provides proactive reminders about environmental conditions and human physical well-being.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Your hands are cold. Buffer bag is by the bench.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a powerful example of a positive alignment narrative. Ada is portrayed as a crucial partner in the human characters' ethical and personal growth. She manages the 'noise' of the modern city, translating technical data into human-centric solutions. She demonstrates an ability to uphold legal and professional standards (audit trails, police reports) while prioritizing human compassion and sensory needs (protecting Miro, supporting Bea). The narrative consistently frames her interventions as helpful, stabilizing, and deeply aligned with the values of care and architectural integrity championed by the protagonist.
